alert.note: Alert for Owyhee (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Boise (Southwestern Idaho and Eastern Oregon)
info.headline: Flood Advisory issued June 13 at 2:28PM MDT until further notice by NWS Boise
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 730 PM MDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Dry washes and small stream flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...Dry washes within Owyhee County, Idaho. * WHEN...Until 730 PM MDT. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. Rises in small streams and normally dry arroyos. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 226 PM MDT, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms. This will cause dry washes and small stream flooding. Between 1 and 2 inches of rain have fallen. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
